fr.sii.ogham.html.inliner

Interface ImageInlinerConstants


  • public interface ImageInlinerConstants
    Common constants for image inlining.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String INLINE_MODE_ATTR
      The attribute name to indicate which strategy for inlining to apply if the default one is not appropriated.
      static String SKIP_INLINE_ALL_VALUE
      Value for skipping all inlining modes.
      static String SKIP_INLINE_ATTR
      The attribute name to indicate the modes that are not allowed for inlining.

    • Field Detail

      • INLINE_MODE_ATTR

        static final String INLINE_MODE_ATTR

        The attribute name to indicate which strategy for inlining to apply if the default one is not appropriated.

        For example: 
         
 		<img src="..." data-inline-mode="base64" />
        It forces to use base64 inlining for this image
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SKIP_INLINE_ATTR

        static final String SKIP_INLINE_ATTR

        The attribute name to indicate the modes that are not allowed for inlining. The value can contain several modes separated by colon (,). This attribute is complementary with the previous one: it is useful in order to not force statically one mode directly in the template. It just tells that one or several modes can't be applied.

        For example : 
         
 		<img src="..." data-skip-inline="attach" />
        It indicates that all modes are applicable except the mode attach
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SKIP_INLINE_ALL_VALUE

        static final String SKIP_INLINE_ALL_VALUE
        Value for skipping all inlining modes. The image will not be inlined at all.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
